No, testing HelloTF.java from here. Would like to try Java version of TF for GPU.

Kubuntu 16.04 64x

TensorFlow installed from

https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.tensorflow/libtensorflow_jni_gpu ?

TensorFlow version

1.10.0

Bazel version

N/A

CUDA/cuDNN version

0.9.2

GPU model and memory

GeForce GTX 750 Ti

Exact command to reproduce

N/A

Mobile device

N/A

Thanks

body:
You're welcome.
> Have I written custom code

No, testing HelloTF.java from [here](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_java). Would like to try Java version of TF for GPU.
> OS Platform and Distribution

Kubuntu 16.04 64x
> TensorFlow installed from

https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.tensorflow/libtensorflow_jni_gpu ?
> TensorFlow version

1.10.0
> Bazel version

N/A
> CUDA/cuDNN version

0.9.2
> GPU model and memory

GeForce GTX 750 Ti

> Exact command to reproduce

N/A
> Mobile device

N/A

Thanks
